bill.title: Relating To Human Remains.
bill.description: Accommodates the use of both traditional Native Hawaiian burial practices and environmentally-friendly burial practices by including water cremation in the treatment and disposal of human remains. (SD2)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to HHH, JHA, CPC, referral sheet 2
Bill scheduled to be heard by HHH on Tuesday, 02-01-22 9:00AM in House conference room 329 Via Videoconference.

The committees on HHH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Tam, Gates, Har, Kapela, Nishimoto, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from HHH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 88-22) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JHA.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JHA with Representative(s) Okimoto voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McDermott excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JHA on Friday, 02-11-22 2:15PM in House conference room 325 Via Videoconference.
The committee(s) on JHA recommend(s) that the measure be deferred.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Monday, 02-14-22 2:00PM in conference room 325 Via Videoconference.

The committees on JHA recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Matayoshi, Ichiyama, D. Kobayashi, Lowen, McKelvey, Nakamura, Takumi, Todd, Tokioka, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) LoPresti.
Reported from JHA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 626-22) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to CPC.
Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on CPC as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Eli, Kapela excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by CPC on Friday, 02-25-22 1:00PM in House conference room 329 Via Videoconference.

The committees on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Kitagawa, Aquino, Har, Hashem, Mizuno, Morikawa, Onishi, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Kong, Tarnas.
Reported from CPC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 922-22) as amended in HD 3, recommending passage on Third Reading.
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-08-22.
Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 3 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) McDermott excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 287).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HWN/HTH, JDC.
The committee(s) on HTH/HWN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-18-22 1:15PM; Conference Room 225 & Videoconference.
Re-Referred to HTH/HWN, JDC.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Keohokalole, Baker, Moriwaki, San Buenaventura; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.

The committee(s) on HWN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HWN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Shimabukuro, Keohokalole, Acasio, Ihara; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from HTH/HWN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3434) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 03-31-22 9:30AM; Conference Room 016 & Videoconference.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 7 Aye(s): Senator(s) Rhoads, Keohokalole, Acasio, Gabbard, Kim, Lee; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Fevella ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3763) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-22.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 22; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Fevella . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 3 (Senator(s) Acasio, Ihara, Inouye). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 732) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 576).
Reconsideration of action taken on 04-12-22.
Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 814).
Deferred one day 05-03-22.
House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) McDermott voting no (1) and none excused (0).
Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 822).
Transmitted to Governor.
